author: rchatter
body:
Backporting PR#27175 [@nancymarinelli @argiro ]

In order to validate and backport PR28040 we need to backport PR#27175 and PR#28514 to make a validation for which PPD will have to advice us on the way how to do it.

This is the first step where we are backporting PR#27175 [ https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27175], which has already been merged.
title: Ecal DPG - Backporting new software[PR 27175] to recover isolated new channels
